title: Feature Request: collections scope
body_html: The is currently no way to assign variables to collections during creation time other than specifying in the explicit function call to tf.get_variable or tf.Variable. This is problematic anytime you'd like to use existing functions that create variables as part of their calls and you want those variables to be part of a certain collection. It's even more problematic when you want variables to not be members of GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES, because this is the default for the tf.get_variable and tf.Variable.

body: The is currently no way to assign variables to collections during creation time other than specifying in the explicit function call to `tf.get_variable` or `tf.Variable`.  This is problematic anytime you'd like to use existing functions that create variables as part of their calls and you want those variables to be part of a certain collection.  It's even more problematic when you want variables to not be members of  `GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES`, because this is the default for the `tf.get_variable` and `tf.Variable`.
